title: Karl Jenkins - Armed Man Mass For Peace
description:
Moving and accessible classical music for the twenty-first century.  Karl Jenkins supplements four texts from the Latin Mass with other traditional and original texts that speak to war and peace.  

The Armed Man
TheCall to Prayers (Adhaan)
Kyrie
Save Me from Bloody Men
Sanctus
Hymn Before Action
Charge!
Angry Flames
Torches
Agnus Dei
Now the Guns Have Fallen Silent
Benedictus
Better Is Peace

Susie Parkes, Soprano Soloist
Elizabeth Witts, Soprano Soloist
Rachel Lloyd, Mezzo-Soprano Soloist
Nicholas Merryweather, Baritone Soloist
Philip Shakesby, Bass Soloist
Tristan Hambleton, Treble Soloist
Mohammed Gad, Muezzin

The National Youth Choir of Great Britain
The London Philharmonic Orchestra
